parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 100.

Default value: 50.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the resource. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   instance: ECS instance
*   disk: disk
*   snapshot: snapshot
*   image: image
*   securitygroup: security group
*   volume: storage volume
*   eni: elastic network interface (ENI)
*   ddh: dedicated host
*   keypair: SSH key pair
*   launchtemplate: launch template

All the preceding values must be lowercase.
